snippet.title: Convrgence: Night Raids Update - Official Launch Trailer | Upload VR Showcase
snippet.description: Pet the dog, prep your weapons, and step into the darkness to face terrifying and formidable enemies in Convrgence's Night Raids update. Watch the latest action-packed trailer for Convrgence to see what to expect with the Night Raids update for the single-player VR shooter featuring survival and horror elements. The Night Raids update for Convrgence is available now on Steam VR.
